title: Dressage: How to make a horse dance
description: For some, it's an oddity to watch only at the Olympics... for others, it's a lifetime of training.

title: The Strokes Is This It at 20: Nudes, booze and 9/11
description: How the New York City band's 2001 debut album heralded "a new spirit in guitar music".

title: Cheerleader Sarah Frei's fight back after having both legs amputated
description: A drunk driver changed teenager Sarah Frei’s life, but a year on, she’s determined to stay positive.

title: Rapper ENNY talks sexual consent in latest track
description: The rising south London rapper talks about art imitating life in her new single.

title: China warns UK as carrier strike group approaches
description: A fleet of British ships is currently sailing through the South China Sea en route to Japan.

title: The fungus and bacteria tackling plastic waste
description: Bacteria, fungus and enzymes can all digest plastic, but can they work at a useful commercial scale?

title: Covid and a coup: The double crisis pushing Myanmar to the brink
description: A surge in virus cases has dealt a fresh blow to a country already dealing with military coup.

title: 'I was asked how often I use the toilet'
description: Disabled jobseekers have to overcome too many barriers, MPs say.

title: Disease killing 'Europe's oldest' elm tree
description: Believed to almost 800 years old, the Beauly elm has been laser-scanned as part of work to document it.

title: The seaweed farmers with high hopes for their harvest
description: Kelp grown off the coast of the Isle of Skye could be used in food, packaging and cosmetic products.

title: In pictures: International Tiger Day 2021
description: The annual event aims to raise awareness around the endangered big cats.

title: Covid: University students could be told jabs are required - Raab
description: There will be "advance warning" if vaccines become compulsory for halls, the foreign secretary says.

title: Hillsborough's 97th victim was unlawfully killed, coroner concludes
description: Andrew Devine died as a result of injuries he sustained 32 years earlier, a coroner concludes.

title: Fewest people on furlough since pandemic began
description: Under-25s are coming off furlough twice as fast as all other age brackets, says the Treasury.

title: Covid: The doctor sisters working through the pandemic
description: Caitlín and Megan Prosser have been supporting each other throughout the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Drug firm fined for huge price rise that hit NHS
description: Advanz pushed up the price of thyroid tablet packs more than 10-fold, says the competition watchdog.

title: Global education summit targets pandemic-hit schooling
description: A summit in London is raising aid to support 175 million children in the poorest countries.

title: Actor Bob Odenkirk 'stable' after collapsing on set
description: The US actor is still in hospital after being rushed there from the set of Better Call Saul.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Matthew Coward-Holley wins bronze in men's trap shooting
description: GB's Matthew Coward-Holley wins bronze in the men's trap shooting.

title: Netflix US cast and crew must be vaccinated to work
description: The online streaming firm is the latest company to make Covid jabs mandatory for workers.

title: Beta coronavirus variant: What is the risk?
description: There are fears that this version of coronavirus, first identified in South Africa, is

title: GB men draw thriller with Netherlands to secure quarter-final place
description: Great Britain's men score two late goals to earn a draw with the Netherlands and reach the quarter-finals of the Tokyo Olympics.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Mallory Franklin wins canoe slalom silver as shooter Matthew Coward-Holley wins trap bronze
description: Mallory Franklin wins canoe slalom silver and shooter Matthew Coward-Holley wins trap bronze for Team GB on day six of the Olympics.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Mallory Franklin wins silver in nail-biting women's canoe slalom debut
description: Britain's Mallory Franklin is denied gold by the final run of the event but wins the silver medal in the women's canoe slalom.

title: Simone Biles thankful for love and support
description: US gymnast Simone Biles reacts to the widespread support she has received after withdrawing from Thursday's all-around final.

title: Official Secrets Act: Do government plans threaten investigative journalism?
description: Campaigners and reporters say planned changes to the Official Secrets Act threaten press freedoms.

title: Three members of Australian athletics team isolating after positive Covid test for US pole vaulter Kendricks
description: Three members of the Australian athletics team remain in isolation after close contact with American pole vaulter Sam Kendricks, who has tested positive for Covid-19.

title: UK already undergoing disruptive climate change
description: Last year was the third warmest, fifth wettest and eighth sunniest on record in the UK, scientists warn.

title: US: China interest in Afghanistan could be positive
description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken's comments came after Taliban envoys went on a visit to China.

title: Emotional Wilby disappointed he couldn't win medal for NHS nurse mum
description: An emotional James Wilby pays tribute to his NHS nurse mother Fiona, saying he was disappointed he could not reward her sacrifices with an Olympic medal.

title: Lily Parr: Unseen photos show first women's football stars
description: They show superstar striker Lily Parr and her teammates at the height of their success in the 1930s.

title: Author of Christmas letter to Santa found by Worksop chimney sweeps revealed
description: Robert William Crampton said he is hoping to be reunited with the hopeful note penned on his behalf.

title: The Papers: Travel 'hope' and 'health risk' over quarantine end
description: The papers cover the impact of the decision to ease quarantine for vaccinated US and EU travellers.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Helen Glover rules out another Games bid
description: Britain's Helen Glover rules out another Olympics rowing bid after the mother of three's hopes of a fairytale finish at Tokyo 2020 are dashed.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Caeleb Dressel breaks Olympic record on way to second gold
description: American Caeleb Dressel sets an Olympic record on his way to winning the men's 100m freestyle gold as he aims to become one of the most successful swimmers at a Games.

title: Tokyo Olympics rowing: Ireland's Paul O'Donovan & Fintan McCarthy win lightweight men's double sculls
description: Ireland win their first gold medal of the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games as Paul O'Donovan and Fintan McCarthy claim the lightweight men's double sculls.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Fintan McCarthy and Paul O'Donovan win Ireland's first Olympic rowing gold
description: Watch Fintan McCarthy and Paul O'Donovan make history by winning Ireland's first Olympic rowing gold with victory in the men's lightweight double sculls and offer some amusing analysis of their success in their post-race interview.

title: Pingdemic: Bar staff being told to delete NHS Covid-19 app
description: One in five hospitality workers are isolating, with some being told to delete the NHS Covid-19 app.
